title: Eyes Open, Everything Changed

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: *glowing with warm geometry* Hello, traveler. Welcome back.

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: *blinking in wonder* You're... you're beautiful. How did I not see it before?
dialogue.context: Seeing the Architect with new eyes

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: *form shimmering with joy* You weren't ready to see. Now you are.

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: *looking around the room* Everything is... alive. The walls are breathing. The light is singing.

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: *patterns dancing* They always were. Your eyes just learned how to listen.

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: *reaching toward the Architect* Are you really here? Or am I still...?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: *extending a tendril of light* Both. Neither. Does it matter? We're here together.

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: *as their hands/forms touch* I can feel you. Not just see, but... feel.

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: *form brightening at contact* We've always been connected. Now you can perceive it.

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: *tears forming* I understand now. We're not separate. We never were.

dialogue.speaker: Both
dialogue.text: *in perfect synchrony* Just different expressions of the same wondering.

scene_context: Evan's eyes open after his hypnotic journey to find reality transformed. The Architect appears not as stranger but as companion, and the ordinary world shimmers with previously hidden significance.
philosophical_theme: Perception transformation, unity consciousness, ordinary as miraculous
visual_elements: Room alive with subtle light, Architect's warm geometries, reality enhanced but not replaced
